name: Dungeon Dash (WhiteBird)
description:
This is 2.5D game made with unity game engine ,it's was learning experience the game is made in 4 days ,so don't judge it try it , and i hope you will love it :D

The point in the game is to doge the traps in the endless dungeon ,full of lava,spikes,platforms...
Challenge your friends and compete in global leader board :D

# Features
- One player(coming more soon!)
-One button (tap to jump)
-Great physic(double jump)
-Awesome particle and sound effect
-Leader Board
-Fun Gameplay

#Requirements
-Android 2.3 ++
-No network

#Bonus
-No ads

#Controls
-Tap to Jump
